ETYMOLOGY: Abbreviation of Mister, which is a variant of master. Used in this form since the late 16th century.

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A title used before the surname or full name of a man, typically used regardless of marital status.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 用于成年男性姓氏或全名之前的尊称，通常不考虑其婚姻状况。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Mr. Johnson called to confirm the appointment.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 约翰逊先生打电话确认了预约。
